data.title: Upcycled bags aiming to redefine luxury
data.meta_description: With a contemporary and refined approach to soft volume, Reco uses high-quality nappa leather combining exclusivity, sustainability and inspiration. Discover the latest collections.
data.text:
Founded by Bea Recoder, a visionary designer with roots in Spain and the heart of Paris, our brand was born in the stillness of 2020. With a rich history at fashion giants like Balenciaga and Chlo√©, Bea infuses RECO with vibrant, durable leather bags that marry artisanal skill with a modern twist.

At RECO, sustainability is our ethos; we craft our collections from carefully chosen leather to reduce waste, creating pieces that are as kind to the planet as they are striking. Handcrafted in Spain and India, each bag is a testament to collaboration, quality, and a shared vision. Join us in embracing a world where exceptional design and sustainable practices go hand in hand.
